exec: tests["Deletion has correct response code"] = responseCode.code === 204;
tests["Delete a boat: boat no longer exists"] = flag === false;

item.name: DELETE /boats/{boat_id} - If the boat was in a slip, the boat is removed from the slip

exec: tests["Contents of slip are correct"] = data.current_boat === null && data.arrival_date === null;
tests["Deletion has correct response code"] = responseCode.code === 204;
tests["Slip no longer exists"] = flag === false;

item.name: DELETE /slips/{slip_id} - If a boat in the slip, the boat is set to at sea

exec: tests["Boat is at sea if in a slip that was deleted"] = data.at_sea === true;
tests["Contents of slip are correct"] = data.number === 33 && data.current_boat === null && data.arrival_date === null;
tests["Boat is set to at sea"] = data.at_sea === true;
